venue.name: The Asgard Irish Pub and Restaurant

item.description:
Join ROY G. BIV, plus members of "Fun with Alcohol", "Social Fun" and more, on a pub crawl from one end of Central Square, starting near MIT and ending at the other end heading toward Harvard Square. We will be taking a group photo and submitting to "Clean the World" to show our enthusiasm and commitment toward the larger national event to be held in Oct.16 This pub crawl is an opportunity to plan and coordinate at the local level.

Wear a SOLID cheerful brightly or neon colored shirt and matching cap.

Wear a solid cheerful brightly or neon colored shirt and matching colored cap.
2:00 The Asgard

2:30 Miracle of Science

Gather for a group photo shot in the park across from the fire station @ Main Street intersection. We will cluster by colors and line up according to the sequence of colors on the light spectrum. Vibrant Solid colored shirts are best for "Rainbow" effect group photo.

3:30 The Field

4:15 People's Republik

5:00 Plough and Stars

5:45 Tavern in the Square

6:15 Green Street Grill


Recommended take the T to Central Square stop on the red line/
Note on Parking in Cambridge: Limited Parking may be available at Green at Street Parking Garage or city lot.
item.how_to_find_us: Print out this event posting and adhereto the time schedule.
item.name: Rainbow Pub Crawl in Central Square
